trans-unit.source: Provides <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> objects for each state of the bottom border of a window.

Each property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.FrameBottom> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the bottom border of a window.
Gets a visual style element that represents the bottom border of an active window.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.FrameBottom.Active%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents the bottom border of an active window.
Gets a visual style element that represents the bottom border of an inactive window.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.FrameBottom.Inactive%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents the bottom border of an inactive window.
